Harmonic Regression

This learner fits first harmonics in a Fourier expansion to one or more time series.

Lrnr_HarmonicReg

Format

R6Class object.

Value

Lrnr_base object with methods for training and prediction.

Fields

n.ahead

The forecast horizon. If not specified, returns forecast of size task$X.

K

Maximum order(s) of Fourier terms.

freq

the number of observations per unit of time.

See also

Other Learners: Lrnr_arima, Lrnr_base, Lrnr_condensier, Lrnr_cv, Lrnr_define_interactions, Lrnr_expSmooth, Lrnr_rugarch, Lrnr_sl, Lrnr_tsDyn, Pipeline, Stack
